Package breadmakesense

Class AscendWindow

java.lang.Object
breadmakesense.AscendWindow
public class AscendWindow extends Object
Class used to create the ascend section, includes a window and the logic to "ascend" in the game

1.0

    • ASCEND_VALUE_DIVIDER

      static int ASCEND_VALUE_DIVIDER
      The ascend value defines how many ascend value are you going to gain when erasing all data. To calculate the ascend value the formula is breads/ASCEND_VALUE_DIVIDER
